Uses of Class
org.alljoyn.ns.NotificationServiceException

  • Packages that use NotificationServiceException 
    Package Description
    org.alljoyn.ns
    The package includes API classes of the Notification service which are used to send and receive notification messages

    • Uses of NotificationServiceException in org.alljoyn.ns

      Methods in org.alljoyn.ns that throw NotificationServiceException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NotificationSender.deleteLastMsg(NotificationMessageType messageType)
      Delete the last message by a given message type
      void NotificationService.initReceive(org.alljoyn.bus.BusAttachment bus, NotificationReceiver receiver)
      Establishes the notification receiver service to later receive notifications.
      NotificationSender NotificationService.initSend(org.alljoyn.bus.BusAttachment bus, org.alljoyn.services.common.PropertyStore propertyStore)
      Establishes the notification sender service to later allow sending notifications See NotificationSender
      void NotificationSender.send(Notification notification, int ttl)
      Send the Notification message
      void NotificationText.setLanguage(java.lang.String language)
      Set the language
      void RichAudioUrl.setLanguage(java.lang.String language)
      Set the language
      void NotificationService.setLogger(GenericLogger logger)
      Set a logger Object to enable logging capabilities
      void Notification.setMessageType(NotificationMessageType messageType)
      Set notification message type
      void Notification.setText(java.util.List<NotificationText> text)
      Set list of NotificationText

      Set the notification text
      void RichAudioUrl.setUrl(java.lang.String url)
      Set the notification url
      void NotificationService.shutdown()
      Shutdown notification service
      void NotificationService.shutdownReceiver()
      Stops notification receiver service
      void NotificationService.shutdownSender()
      Stops notification sender service
